jobs.description: Professional internship contract as Front-End developer in FullStack. Work done, migration of the ferreyarns website from Worpress to ReactJS, development of the Vetech site for the management of pet consultations for veterinarians.
Front-End developer in kannbal conuslting. Development of web solutions for LMS like Edmodo, Moodle etc, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web Development with ReactJS.
Front-end development with NextJS, Graphql and ApolloClient and Material-UI and Back-end devlopment with NodeJS, ApolloServer, Python, MongoDB, MySQL, Docker.
